org.pitest.mutationtest.engine

Class MutationDetails

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pitest.mutationtest.engine.MutationDetails

  • public final class MutationDetails
extends Object
    Captures all data relating to a mutant.

        public boolean mayPoisonJVM()
        Indicates if this mutation might poison state within the jvm (e.g affect the values of static variable)
        Returns:
        true if the mutation might poison the jvm otherwise false

      • getBlock

        public int getBlock()
        Returns the basic block in which this mutation occurs. See https://github.com/hcoles/pitest/issues/131 for discussion on block coverage
        Returns:
        the block within the method that this mutation is located in

      • matchesId

        Returns:
        true if the MutationIdentifier matches otherwise false

      • getFirstIndex

        public int getFirstIndex()
        Returns the index to the first instruction on which this mutation occurs. This index is specific to how ASM represents the bytecode.
        Returns:
        the zero based index to the instruction
